scripts.say: What the hell! The enemies came from the south, so why didn't Chicago tell us anything?!
Um, when Australia came here, perhaps there was an error in delegating the next in command?
Dele... gation? What does that mean?
Now's not the time to explain... We have to assume the worst case scenario - that Chicago's forces were taken out before they had a chance to react...
For the time being, I'll issue an alarm to mobilize all our forces, but I don't think reinforcements are going to be able to make it.
You don't need to explain that to me! The enemy's right in front of our eyes!
Quincy, Vincennes, stay on your guard!
